pages.text: Sometimes, the basic appearance of blocks isn't quite as appealing as you'd like. To resolve this, you can make and use a $(item)Chisel$() to alter the appearance in a variety of ways. Right click with it to access the Chiseling menu and insert blocks to see the different options.
Durability: 8192 $(br2)Can change Chisel Modes in the GUI.
Durability: 32767 $(br2)Can change Chisel Modes in the GUI. Can chisel all of the same block in your inventory at once. Shows a preview of the blocks for connected textures.
Shifts the position of connected textures
Allows automatic chiseling of materials. Requires a $(item)Chisel$() and a target block to be set in the middle.
